channel.title: NEED help with Compiler
channel.description:
ok my compiler is working "fine". i can edit stats and all that and it refreshes them in to the game just ok.
but when i try to forexample make an npc say if im online or offline nothing happens. i paste in the VERY same code.
im doing all this on a pimpscape server and i got a dark mage saying Pimp is offline.
i edited the scrip like the tut sed to and took server offline compiled and logged back in. there the mage still was saying pimp is offline.
I NEED HELP
if u have pimpscape source with a working compile can u just paste the code inside the compiler in to here
if you somehow using your magic skillz make this work for me i will give u silver crown and all 135 stats for my server

item.title: NEED help with Compiler
item.dc:creator: @haha_ur_ded haha_ur_ded
item.description:
@haha_ur_ded wrote:

error could not find the main class.

btw i have javaw not javac (that might be problem) but ive tried downloading ALL types of javas ranging from java1.4 to java1.6 and all of them have javaw for me

if i make edit the javac to javaw then i get error that the path cant be found or sumthin

Read full topic

item.title: NEED help with Compiler
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

@echo off title Killscape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java JAVA -Xmx512m server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause;

Try that, that’s for a pimpscape source.

Read full topic

item.title: NEED help with Compiler
item.dc:creator: @haha_ur_ded haha_ur_ded
item.description:
@haha_ur_ded wrote:

have you not read my post. im not asking how to change it. im asking how to make my changes work

i HAVE changed EVERYTHING like i have to but the noob NPC are still blabbering the same st00f

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2262) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("ownt")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "OWNT is online"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "OWNT is offline"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: NEED help with Compiler
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

The answer is simple. Open up NPCHandler.java, Search for ‘Pimp’ no apostraphy’s. Then change ‘Pimp’ to your name.

Read full topic

and i have jdk1.6.0

heres wut i have atm. it only works for minor changes.

@echo off title Pimpscape Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javaw.exe" "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" server pause

item.title: NEED help with Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Shaun Mod Shaun
item.description:
@Mod_Shaun wrote:

I think i can help…

Open NPCHandler.Java

Search for any of this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1835) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YOURUSERHERE")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "USERHERE is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "USERHERE is OFFLINE"; } } }

If you dont have it put that in…

Change the YOURUSERHERE to your Username…

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
